name: DynamicPickList

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the VisualEditor.DynamicPicklist object.

methods.name: getDefaultValue
methods.description: Returns the picklist item that is set as the default value for the picklist.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the user-facing label for a specified picklist value.

methods.name: getValues
methods.description: Returns the list of picklist item values.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Returns the valid state of the picklist item’s value. A picklist value is considered valid if it’s a part of any VisualEditor.DataRow in the VisualEditor.DynamicPickListRows returned by getValues().

description: An abstract class, used to display the values of a picklist in a Lightning component on a Lightning page.
